ygData.subject: Lambent breastplate quest peculiarity
ygData.msgSnippet: I completed the lambent breastplate quest the other day.  When I gave the quest components to Cyrissia (sp?), I got the breastplate, faction change messages,
ygData.messageBody:
I completed the lambent breastplate quest the other day. When I gave the
quest components to Cyrissia (sp?), I got the breastplate, faction change
messages, experience gain message, etc. I then noticed on the next line in
the text window a message from Cyrissia saying "Aren't you forgetting
something?". None of the words were bracketed as a key word/phrase. I
tried replying with variations of "What am I forgetting?" but got no further
response from her. Was wondering if this was just a bug or if there might
possibly something else I could have given her?

Galtin of E'ci
30 bard
